edu.uci.isr.impromptu.repository
Class BufferedRequestWrapper

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
          edu.uci.isr.impromptu.repository.BufferedRequestWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
public class BufferedRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper

Wrap an http request so its input stream can be reused when aggregating from multiple repositories. Adapted from http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jspa?forumID=33&threadID=238221

Author:
Jie Ren
